meanings.definition: A person who is passionate about cinema.
meanings.sent1: Many cineastes enjoy analyzing films for hidden meanings.
meanings.sent2: Film festivals often attract cineastes from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The cineastes had a movie marathon and debated about their favorite directors.
meanings.sent4: She was a true cineaste, seeing every film nominated for an award.
meanings.sent5: The group of cineastes discussed the art of filmmaking late into the night.

meanings.sent1: The cineastes gathered to discuss their favorite movies.
meanings.sent2: At the film club meeting, the cineastes shared their top picks.
meanings.sent3: The cineastes decided to watch a classic film in black and white for fun.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cineastes, foreign films hold a special place.
meanings.sent5: The cineastes' collection of DVDs showcased their love for cinema.
